column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: All lanes now open on Newtown Pike at Citation Blvd after a semi lost a load of batteries.

column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: Traffic remains backed up on Newtown Pike, and also on I-75N between Newtown Pike and Winchester Rd.

column3: Traffic Alert for Newtown Pike and I-75N:
column4: Motorists should use added caution while traffic flow returns to normal.
